original_text: But these people do not obey me, as the waves do. They have turned away from me. They have chosen to go their own way. But these people do not obey me, as the waves do.
korean_text: 그러나 너희 백성은 배반하며 반역하는 마음이 있어서 이미 배반하고 갔으며

sentences.original_text: But these people do not obey me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 사람들은 나를 순종하지 않고

sentences.original_text: They have turned away from me
They have chosen to go their own way
But these people do not obey me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 사람들은 나를 순종하지 않습니다
